name: Flappy Square (Player740)
description:
A html game.

Like it. It's a game where Me, my friend, and his sis created this game. We worked super hard and I am desperate for likes, comments and suggestions. ;) :D :)

If you die,  just reload* 

*You will not die if you hit the ground or if you get too high. You will only die if you hit obstacles.
